```{r setup , include=FALSE}
                      size = "footnotesize",
                      comment = NA,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      fig.align = "center",
                      fig.width = 8, 
                      fig.height = 4,

                      fig.path = "Figuras/",

                      background = "#E6E6FA",
                      dev = c("png",'pdf'),
                      res=300,
                      dpi = 300,
                      cache = TRUE)

```
